return msg;

name: BD
query:
from(bucket: "IPB_TRACKER")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitude")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> top(n: 3, columns: ["_time"])

name: BD
query:
from(bucket: "IPB_TRACKER")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system" or r["_measurement"] == "clime" or r["_measurement"] == "gps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "porcentagem" or r["_field"] == "vel" or r["_field"] == "temp" or r["_field"] == "longitude" or r["_field"] == "latitude" or r["_field"] == "hum")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> top(n: 3, columns: ["_time"])

name: Acellerometer define
Gateway local
BD
query:
from(bucket: "IPB_TRACKER")
  |> range(start: -30m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateway")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rssi_lora")

name: Device did not send any data
Message
